measure.dldescription: Name of the KPI  being expressed. Eg. Days in milk per cow , KgMilksolids/ha

denominator.dldescription: Denominator of the KPI (if any). Typical denominators include /ha, /FTE, /hd

participants.dldescription: Sample size or number of participating entities whose data has been aggregated to compute the benchmark KPI

qualityScore.dldescription: Quality of the benchmark data indicated on a scale of 0-5

aggregation.dldescription: Describes the aggregation function applied to the dataset to compute the KPI. Measures of spread describe how similar or varied the set of observed values are for a particular variable (data item). Measures of spread include the range, quartiles and the interquartile range, variance and standard deviation. Eg.Average,Median,Mean,Percentile,Quartile,Mode

aggregationOrder.dldescription: Eg. First , Second for Quartile aggregation
